anime.description: * In 1993, http://anidb.net/cr1009 [Toei Animation], in cooperation with http://anidb.net/cr5372 [Shounen Jump] and V-Jump, produced a http://anidb.net/a2643 [two-part OVA] that served as a video strategy guide to the Family Computer game titled Dragon Ball Z Gaiden: Saiyajin Zetsumetsu Keikaku. This OVA was remade for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 video game Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2. Dr. Lychee may be the last of the Tuffle people, a race that was completely wiped some time ago by the Saiyans. He now plans to take revenge on the remaining Saiyans, http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Goku], http://anidb.net/ch2105 [Vegeta], http://anidb.net/ch13302 [Trunks], and http://anidb.net/ch11419 [Gohan]. He creates a machine that will emit Destron, a gas that could destroy all life on Earth. The Saiyans, plus http://anidb.net/ch11416 [Piccolo], only have 72 hours to destroy this machine and find Dr. Lychee. Source: Wikipedia
